name: Dunjungle
description: A 2d action-packed roguelike about an ape protecting the jungle from the rise of a corruptive power. Explore ever-changing dungeons, fight weird enemies and gear up with lots of weapons and relics you can combine for a new experience every run. Explore, fight, die, and repeat!

name: Awaken: Astral Blade
description: Weave your own story in this dark fairy tale. In the mysterious ancient ruins, Loretta, a girl who has parasitized by an alien beast, tries to break through the fog and uncover the truth about her fate. Is there any chance of survival in the darkest place?

name: HorrorDriven: A story for the road
description: HorrorDriven: A story for the road takes survival horror into new territories. Explore, survive and solve mysteries in procedurally generated open world environments. Travel the road and scavenge for resources in abandoned locations while avoiding the dangers of an unforgiving and dynamic world.

name: No More Room in Hell 2
description: No More Room in Hell 2 is a terrifying 8 player co-op action horror experience. Find your friends in the dark and survive - in a dynamic, endlessly replayable zombie apocalypse.

name: Xenrai
description: Save the last world in a solar system of living planets being consumed by an invading interstellar army, playing as the world's champion and its goddess. Take on the epic full length campaign and competitive combat focused challenge mode that awaits you in this Sci-Fi spectacle fighter epic brought to you by Zenith Edge Studios.

name: Old School Vibes Bundle
description:
In this Bundle, you will find our Xbox and Windows games.
Little Bear, Slime Ranger, Sunbeam Feast, Dark Elven Legacy, Ducky Dash, Mr. T-Shirt, Beyond Doors, Factory Escape, Magical Backpack, SokoNature, Frozen Gauntlet and Nox Dash.

name: Football Life 2025
description: Football Life 2025 game is an attempt to continue the offline modes of the retired PES series, football life is a standalone football game based on PES 21, built for offline career modes only. SP Football Life is how we like to play a football game.

name: Hentai Girls: Complete +
description: Sin descripción

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Complete +
description: Sin descripción

name: Election Tycoon: Trump vs. Harris
description: Step into the intense world of U.S. politics with Election Tycoon! In this real-time strategy game, you'll take on the role of a presidential candidate in the 2024 elections. Whether you choose to be Donald Trump, Kamala Harris, or create your own independent candidate, your goal is to sway the nation and secure your place in the White House.

name: Love Me or Die
description: Yuki, a lonely teenager, embarks on a desperate quest for popularity and fame. But her path soon turns into a dark and tragic journey that will change her life forever. A retro graphic adventure with challenging puzzles, intense tweet battles, and a pixelated world filled with humor and mysteries.

name: Water Level / B.l.u.e. Exploration
description: Sin descripción

name: Keep Your Eyes Open
description: Everyone must blink, and you are no different. Blinking allows you to see and move around, just watch out for the giant monster who appears to hunt you down when you don't keep your eyes open.

name: CatTrio
description: A physics puzzle game in which you have to put cats in a pot and match them! Aim for a high score!

name: Infinite Idle: Online Clicker RPG
description: Hold down the spacebar or left-click and join the action! Upgrade, grow stronger, and progress endlessly. Enjoy infinite fun with your simple yet powerful strategy to reach the top!

name: East Trade Tycoon: Inheritance
description: Eastern Trade Tycoon: Inheritance is a trading simulator game.In the game,you can from zero to hero.By trading markets, build a business,earn money,level up, investing accurately, and manage family to become a trading tycoon!

name: WiThu, It's Time To Go
description: WiThu, It's Time To Go is an RPG Maker Horror puzzle game. You wake up in a familiar place. Something that everyone has is called a name, but you don't. Searching for who we are and the truth of these things. The adventures in mysterious lands are waiting for you.

name: The Stone of Wisdom
description: The Stone of Wisdom is a top-down, Zelda-like ARPG, it features action-adventure style gameplay. Players will explore egyptian cities, battling mythical creatures, solving puzzles, collecting special items, and finding secret passages.

name: Who is Paul
description: Isaac, a failed detective, receives a mysterious letter that leads him to investigate a desolate and abandoned house in order to make ends meet. However, upon arrival, he realizes that instead of investigating, he must survive. To escape this house filled with dark secrets,

name: Skel Dungeon
description: Skel Dungeon is a real-time strategy defense game. Become a small skeleton and defeat the heroes invading your dungeon. Set up and upgrade trap rooms, expand your dungeon, and strengthen your skeleton to stand against increasingly powerful heroes.

name: Chronos Time
description: Sin descripción

name: The Children of Clay
description: The Children of Clay is a short stop motion archeology horror game, where you have to study an ancient artefact and discover its dark secret.

name: Tuonela
description: Tuonela is a roguelike survival game where you will choose among many heroes and battle your way through the endless hordes of undead, demons and many other foes. Set in medieval times and using 90s graphical look. Venture deep in the savage realm of Nendhir alone or with your friends. Gain new powers, collect gold to unlock more heroes and descend down to the dark hellish realms of madness and despair.

name: Hound: Automaton
description: In this hyper-realistic multiplayer horror game, one player starts as The Hound, while up to 15 players are human survivors trying to hide. Navigate through hyper-realistic environments, and experience the ultimate survival horror experience in multiplayer.

name: Gullet
description: Gullet is a tension-fueled psychological horror game in which you will rappel down into and explore a colossal mouth post-rapture and control how quickly you descend by how tightly you squeeze your left hand brake in real life and in the game.

name: Nova: Space Armada
description: An exceptional sci-fi strategy game based on space adventure as its core.

name: Neptune Island
description: Neptune Island is a short puzzle game where you have been tasked with repairing the light of a lighthouse. The light has been out for some time, and the owner hasn't done anything to fix it. Unbeknownst to you, you have a much more difficult job ahead of you than you anticipated...

name: Slide Faster
description: Master precision and agility as you conquer the ice. Race against time and challenge friends worldwide with asynchronous multiplayer features. Compete against the ghosts of friends and top players in time trials, pushing your skills to the limit.

name: The Rocky Horror Show Video Game
description:
Experience the strange journey of Brad and Janet like never before in this wild and wacky retro platform game adaptation of Richard O'Brien's legendary rock'n'roll musical.

Run and jump through Frank-N-Furter's mansion of madness with authentic classic sidescrolling platform gameplay.

Take on the mansion's tricks and traps in challenging classic platforming action, and with infinite retries, you'll never see a "game over" screen... good for relieving your tension, but it may drive you insane!

name: Små Ord
description: Finn dyret som elgen tenker på i flotte naturomgivelser. Gjett deg frem ved hjelp av bokstavene og se om du klarer utfordringen!

name: Barheim
description: A single-player, 3D Time Management Tower Defense where players experience the chaos of mixing drinks and maintaining a bar while defending themselves from thirsty Vikings!

name: Spooky Squad!
description: Capture and fight ghosts in this spooky game made for the Playdate.

name: Subterranauts
description: Subterranauts is a 2-6 player multiplayer horror game with proximity voice chat and terrifying creatures. Your job is to complete assignments by gathering scrap for the Association of Scrap Allocation. Work together with your team to complete assignments, earn company Bucks, and survive!

name: Garage Mechanic Simulator 3D
description: Are you ready to build your own business?

name: Paper Mario: TTYD - Tower of Trials
description:
Tower of Trials is a mod of Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door created by jdaster64 which pits Mario and his partners against a Rogue-like series of random battles, with a choice of different rewards after clearing each floor.

The mod also reworks a number of existing moves and badges, adds multiple new moves to each partner's moveset, and has an expanded Journal menu with logs for achievements completed, and moves, items and badges encountered.

name: Piece Shogi
description: A turn-based strategy game with unique rules added to Shogi. New and various strategies are created by the special effect pieces.

name: Say Cheese
description: Hunger speaks louder! Help our rodent hero find his way to the cheese in a maze full of challenges

name: Wobbly Heights
description: Enter a world where blocks defy norms! Stack, grow, shrink, and solidify blocks in a puzzle game that's all about strategy and creativity to make the tallest tower possible as demands keep rising. How tall will your tower become?

name: Locust Hunter
description: Though faraway, they shall be vanquished! "Locust Hunter" is a third-person, level-based space shooter game. Pilot WHEEL fights through Locust defenses with lasers, missiles, and more. Her ally, NIGHT, gathers parts for weapon upgrades. Enjoy unlimited ammo and regenerating armor—just push forward!

name: Monkey Mischief
description: Monkey Mischief is a multiplayer hand locomotion based VR game that has little bits of everything.

name: Clank!
description: Clank!, the iconic deck-building board game adventure, challenges daring thieves to sneak into a dragon’s lair, steal one of her precious artifacts, and escape – before you’re roasted to a crisp!

name: Bug Ball 3D
description: BUG BALL 3D is a top down precision platformer where you take the role of a rollie pollie. Complete courses as fast as you can, or take it chill and complete them at your leisure.

name: Insight
description: Insight is a single-player horror game shrouded in mystery. You'll take control of different characters to solve crimes and unveil the dark secrets behind them.

name: Spready
description: Let's solve artists' dilemmas while solving 3D puzzles using optical illusions. Paint the canvas with crayons, erase with an eraser, turn the wheels, and change the camera perspective. To create a perfect piece, you must use all art materials to color every square of the canvas.

name: Elemental Empire
description: An economic 4x strategy in a space filled with magic and procedurally generated planets. Build your own empire and become the sole ruler of a new world. Compete against your friends in multiplayer mode.

name: Lockjaw
description: Lockjaw is a party brawler where robots use interchangeable arm, leg, and head parts to knock each other around to win a robo-royale! Play with up to four players locally or over Steam Remote Play Together.

name: Desire: Mrs. Claus
description: Desire: Mrs. Claus is a captivating puzzle game with 18 levels, each featuring a sensual Mrs. Claus. Get into the holiday spirit, exercise your mind, and have fun with this relaxing and exciting game.

name: Worshippers of Cthulhu
description: LEAD the CULT OF CTHULHU. Decide the fate of your followers, perform eldritch rituals, and master the art of city-building in a world where the line between sanity and madness blurs. Can you endure the horrors you unleash?

name: Altarium
description: Altarium is a first-person, asymmetric PVP Co-Op horror game that can be played by 1-5 players together. Players can choose to play as either the victim or the evil character. Get ready, choose your role, shape your destiny, and survive!

name: Forsaken Frontiers
description: Step into the frozen unknown in Forsaken Frontiers, a cooperative analog horror adventure set in the unforgiving embrace of an everlasting winter.

name: Tormenture
description: A disturbing, pixelated game inspired by classic games. Solve puzzles, explore surreal worlds and escape from ghosts to avoid being trapped in the game - be careful, some creatures may break out of the game and lurk in the shadows!

name: Mech Academy
description: It is the year 2075 and you are the pilot of a Guardian Mech. Gigantic war machines built to defend Earth from the Noxa, a ruthless alien race intent on conquering your planet. As a result of a mysterious experiment, you have been catapulted two centuries forward in time...

name: Max Capacity
description: Be the Boss....How quick can you get rich and expand your empire? Do you create everything on your own or buy on the market? Before you get to that point, what will you make? Should you go for a finished product or build material used by others to create product?

name: Tower Pets
description: Build the perfect team and compete with other players to win the tournament!

name: Speedollama
description: Speedollama is a platformer shooter aiming to be one of the fastest games in the genre! Do not play it if you are an alpaca! DISCLAIMER FOR THE MORE SENSITIVE: it contains a lot of pixelated splatter elements, like alpacas exploding in a cloud of blood.

name: Factorio: Space Age
description: Factorio: Space Age continues the player's journey after launching rockets into space. Discover new worlds with unique challenges, exploit their novel resources for advanced technological gains, and manage your fleet of interplanetary space platforms.

name: Currently Unstable
description: Master electrifying puzzles in 'Currently Unstable'! Strategically transfer electricity, utilize dynamic electrical components, and conquer each level to Activate the Power Core. Unleash your puzzle-solving skills and tame the currents for endless fun!

name: Numanuin
description: Numanuin Incredible indie horror, a deconstruction of the horror genre. Seemingly simple, but saturated inside Point-and-click in the VHS style.

name: Wayfinder
description: Become a Wayfinder, and unlock their powers as you choose your path and playstyle while pushing back a hostile force that has overtaken your world. Control the Chaos as you directly shape and customize the endless adventures you go on with friends, because Wayfinders are stronger together.

name: It's Only Money
description: The mayor of Rockhaven threw you down a hole into the Undercity. Why? Net worth too low. In this 1-4 player low-life simulation, emerge to the surface to steal from the rich, fight tycoons and reclaim the city block by block. Buy houses, businesses and whatever your materialistic heart desires!

name: Railroad Corporation 2
description: Railroad Corporation 2 is a train tycoon game set at the turn of the 20th century, where you take on the mantle of a railroad magnate to start your new railroad corporation. Seize the opportunity of railroad electrification to lead the charge in the new era of trains. Strategize as you lay tracks, balance finances, deploy locomotives to ferry goods across vast landscapes, and outpace the competition.

name: Nation War 2: Chronicle
description: NationWar 2.0 is a big strategy game based on the theme of the Spring and Autumn and Warring States period. There are more than 60 countries to choose from in the game. Map 1: 1 restores the mountainous landscapes and rivers of China.

name: Ride Hailing Simulator
description: Come and experience the feeling of a ride hailing driver, listening to orders, running orders, and charging new energy vehicles! Complete the task list, look at the speedometer, listen to music, and enjoy leisure time!

name: Prescription: Love
description:
"You wake up in a hospital with no memory of how you got there. A kind and attentive doctor assures you that you will be under his care, patiently nursing you back to health. No one seems to know what caused your condition. "

Will you recover your lost memories...? Or has he made sure you never will?

name: Hermeticism
description: Hermeticism is a 9-Map wad for Heretic that replaces Episode 1.

name: 0101: Pusher Bonus Levels 2
description: This DLC includes another 10 bonus Pusher levels, extremely cool, which will make you love the game even more.

name: Rooftop Rascal: The Spooky Cat
description: In "Rooftop Rascal: The Spooky Cat," take control of a nimble cat scaling fire escapes and rooftops in a Halloween-themed adventure. Test your quick thinking and jumping skills as you climb higher and higher to reach the rooftop.

developers.name: Christian Marcell de Oliveira trading as chroda

name: Carpet Gallery
description: An endless walker with procedural scenery and objects.

name: Extinction Facility
description: Extinction Facility is an immersive VR horror fan game that brings a fresh and terrifying twist to the Gorilla Tag-inspired genre. Set in a dark, sprawling facility, the game draws heavily from chilling inspirations like "Big Scary" and "Scary Baboon," creating an atmosphere filled with tension, suspense, and unexpected frights.

name: Capybara Go!
description:
Love capybaras so much you want to play as one? Get ready to embark on a whimsical adventure with a bunch of furry, feathery, fantastic friends!
Introducing the craziest capybara roguelike adventure RPG!
Dive into the world of capybaras with "CAPYBARA GO"!

name: Dark Legacy
description: Dark Legacy is a 2d Pixel Art Jump and Run Game! It will be available in the Google Play Store from October 20th, 2024 and it is a mobile game!

name: Devil's Way
description: A nightmare that starts with hallucinations in a forest where we don't know where... Demons that resemble familiar faces are after us. Is it real or a game of your mind? The game invites you to a challenging journey in the dark.

name: Nuclear Nightmare
description: Venture forth as part of a specialized team of fellow players tasked with retrieving classified materials, evading the black goo virus, and the nightmarish entities it has spawned. With time running out before the US government initiates a devastating nuclear strike to contain the spreading menace.

name: Fall
description: This is a roguelike shooting game with a strategic top-down angle and a third person perspective. The once bustling city is suddenly invaded by a mysterious virus, and infected citizens become extremely aggressive overnight. When it falls, lead your remaining soldiers to battle.

name: Neko Atsume 2
description: Upcoming sequel to the mobile game Neko Atsume.

name: Descent
description: Mythology based bunnyhopping FPS with various movement mechanics.

name: Dusty Derby
description: Dusty Derby is a large online multiplayer party royal game with 32 players. Cute Dusts Compete to be King of Dusts in various places in the house!

name: War War
description: A 4-player multiplayer real-time / turn-based strategy game. Move armies on the board in turn-based mode and invade other armies to enter real-time strategy "skirmish" battles! Win enough small battles to take over the board and win the War!

name: How to Build a Flying City
description: When tasked to build a flying city, it's up to you to rake in all the money you'll need! Recruit travelers and adventurers to help your city flourish!

name: Comic Store Arcade
description: Run a comic store!

name: Aquarium Land: Parrot Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Thief Puzzle: Tricky Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Mechanic Supermarket Simulator
description: Gear up and take the wheel in Mechanic Supermarket Simulator! Build, manage, and expand your very own automotive retail empire. From stocking shelves with cutting-edge car parts to mastering market trends, can you create the ultimate one-stop shop for car enthusiasts?

name: Invasion
description:
Cosmic beings must invade the planet Sunset to settle before their own world is consumed by a cesspool in space. Your mission is to clear the planet's surface in each level before the resupply ships land. In each level, you will face three enemies that you must hit multiple times to eliminate them and clear the area, allowing the ships to land safely. As you advance, the enemies will become faster and more resistant to your bombs, and the enemy fleet will also appear blocking your way to the runway.

This Atari 2600 game challenges you to fight for the survival of your species, no matter the cost.

name: Spot It
description: Spot It is a game where players quickly find the one object with a different color among many. Each level gets harder with more objects. The goal is to score as high as possible by spotting the unique object quickly. How fast can you spot it?

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Australia
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Australia landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Xeno TD
description: The task is very simple - do not let the enemy forces pass on the way to your base. Enemies move along a marked path while you place defense towers along the path.

name: Shadow and Darkness
description: You are a explorer of new planets. As it turned out, other planets are inhabited by shadows that are very hostile. Your task is to survive several waves to win.

name: Along the River During the Qingming Festival
description: With an academic research approach, the game meticulously explores the masterpiece "Along the River During the Qingming Festival" and strives to allow more people to appreciate the ancient folk customs of China.

name: The Dream Labyrinth
description: The Dream Labyrinth is a single-player game that combines tower defense with roguelike elements. Gather companions in the form of souls and use artifacts and structures to aim for the deepest part of the dream, where the key to the contract lies!

name: Homebound: New Beginnings
description: Explore, craft, build and thrive in the magical lands of Solaria. Discover the curse that destroyed these lands and your connection to the past as you grow relationships between clans of magic and monsters, but maybe not all is as it seems?

name: RetroRealms Double Feature: Halloween and Ash vs. Evil Dead - Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Funko Fusion: Happy Little Bundle
description: Funko Fusion & Bob Ross Pack

name: Seeds of Power Bundle: Weedcraft Inc & Cultist Simulator: Anthology
description: Grow your cult and weed empire in this unique, strategic bundle.

name: Outbreak: Shattered Dreams Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: The Smurfs: Colorful Stories - Complete +
description: Sin descripción

name: Fit My Zoo: Complete +
description: Sin descripción

name: Bowling Fever: Diamond Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tomb Raider I•II•III Remastered: Deluxe Edition
description:
For the first time ever, play the complete experience with all expansions and secret levels on modern platforms in this definitive collection.
Deluxe Steelbook Edition includes
• Physical copy of Tomb Raider I-III Remastered Starring Lara Croft
• SteelBook
• Exploration map book (featuring over 80 pages full of secrets, including all maps from all three games and their expansions)
• Collectible tuck-in box
• The collection's original soundtrack

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed - 1987 Animated Series Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed - Season Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Galactic Loader
description: Galactic Loader is an action-platformer about a space loader who is forgotten on a hostile alien planet which is abandoned by people. The game has various power-ups, big bosses and many monsters that the player needs to defeat. On his journey, the hero finds leftover equipment that provides new abilities for the player. Fight through hordes of alien, giant monsters and escape the planet!

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed - Deluxe Edition
description:
Embark on an pizza-fueled journey with Leonardo, Raphael, Donatello and Michelangelo to battle an all-new wave of havoc-wreaking mutants as you join forces with familiar faces in thrilling missions across the streets of NYC!
The Deluxe Edition features exclusive TMNT themed collectibles that pay homage to your favourite heroes in a half shell, including an awesome Steelbook and a radical artbook which tells the story behind Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed! Beyond the physical game, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed – Deluxe Edition includes the following exclusive items: · Steelbook
· 4 Pin Badges resembling the belt buckles of each of the 4 Turtles.
· 4 Keychains resembling the weapons of each of the 4 Turtles.
· Softcover Artbook.
· All contents packaged inside a collectible tuck-in box.

name: Funko Fusion: Bob Ross Pack
description:
Bring the joy of painting to Funko Fusion with the iconic artist and pop culture icon Bob Ross!

The Bob Ross Pack introduces everyone’s favourite artist to Funko Fusion and contains:
- Bob Ross as a playable in-game character.
- An alternate Bob Ross variant.

name: Funko Fusion: Back to the Future Outfits Pack
description:
Great Scott!
You won’t need roads where we’re going with Back to the Future’s beloved Marty and Doc! This DLC includes:
Marty McFly 1955 Outfit
Marty McFly 2015 Outfit
Doc Brown 1985 Outfit
Doc Brown 2015 Outfit

name: Funko Fusion: Sun Wukong
description: Unleash heavenly wrath as the unstoppable Monkey King, a legendary figure of unmatched will and determination. Where there is true will, there is always a way.

name: Flight Masters: The Horizon Chase
description:
Soar to new heights in Flight Masters: The Horizon Chase! Experience the adrenaline of high-speed aerial racing with intuitive controls supporting both PS4 and Xbox controllers. Race against friends in thrilling split-screen multiplayer, or challenge yourself in a variety of game modes.

Explore expansive environments in Free Roam mode, compete in the exciting Championship, or push your limits in Time Trial challenges. With diverse tracks and stunning visuals, every race promises a unique adventure!

Customize your aircraft for peak performance and style, and climb the leaderboards to prove you’re the ultimate Flight Master. Whether you're a casual flyer or a fierce competitor, Flight Masters: The Horizon Chase offers endless fun for everyone.

Join the race today and become a legend in Flight Masters: The Horizon Chase! Download now and take off!

name: The Fire Rises
description:
It is 2020. The world holds it’s breath as a newly discovered coronavirus disease spirals out of control, and spreads like wildfire worldwide. Economies plunge into another recession, societies further radicalize, and worst of all, political instability is on the rise. Surely nothing worse could happen, right?
With the collapse of Saudi Arabia into civil war, the Coronavirus Pandemic, and the nationwide riots against police brutality, at a scale worse than the 1992 LA riots, the United States of America is facing it’s darkest hour. It’s collapse is inevitable, and the world balance is at stake. With the death of the American Hegemony, her modern rivals eye their historic territories with an unfound vigor.

name: For The Win
description: Welcome to FTW, the fast-paced Multiplayer Battle Royale Hero Shooter! Dive into non-stop action, claim rewards in tournaments every week, and play with friends in quick, exciting multiplayer matches.

name: VHS Collection: Goodnight Me
description: VHS Collection: Goodnight Me is a short horror game where reality blurs with nightmares over five eerie days. Experience strange events, unsettling dreams, and unravel a chilling mystery in a remote house. Can you survive the madness, or will the nightmare consume you?

name: Crust Shump
description: CRUST PUNK SHOOT 'EM UP. BLAST BEAT BULLET HELL. HARDCORE ANARCHO ARCADE ACTION. BRUTAL, BLEAK, SHORT AND INTENSE. NO SCORE, NO LEADERBOARDS, NO GODS, NO MASTERS. CAVE MEETS NAPALM DEATH.

name: One Map
description: Sin descripción

name: 0101: Classic Bonus Levels 2
description: This DLC includes another 10 bonus Classic levels, extremely cool, which will make you love the game even more.

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Discovery Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Moto Rush GT: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Join the Turtle brothers straight from the sewers and slide into this new adventure of shell-shocking proportions!

name: Last Subway
description: Have you ever had such a gaming experience? It’s filled with wild screams, even mocking the developers, yet you find yourself moved to tears at the end. Perhaps this game is one of those! Why? The truth lies at the last subway station.

name: Idle Command: Supply Frontline
description: Fortify your base, care for your troops, and command victory in every battle!

name: Moorhuhn Jump and Run: Traps and Treasures 3
description: In Moorhuhn Jump and Run ‘Traps and Treasures 3’, 31 levels full of traps and enemies await you!

name: Princess Rapunzel: The Kingdom's Legacy
description: This novel follows Rapunzel, who, after restoring peace to her kingdom, discovers that her legacy holds even more secrets

name: Hexa River
description: Explore HEXA RIVER, a relaxing puzzle game where you guide water to bring life to islands. Enjoy 40 levels, soothing music, low-poly visuals, and rewarding achievements as you help crops thrive.

name: Wally the Seal 2
description:
The new entry in the Wally The Seal series arrives! You were able to escape the mazes last time, but your second go around won't be so easy!

In Wally The Seal 2, your objective is to find and collect 4 mysterious flowers from each of the levels. Use the new Salmon Radar to track the flowers while avoiding Wally The Seal and his partner Mrs. Wally.

name: Revert
description: In Revert, use the time-manipulation powers granted to you by the Animal Spirits to solve over 40 puzzles in this puzzle-platformer. You start out with the ability to Save the state of the world, and Revert to go back to how it was. Solve puzzles with the world now reorganized! As you progress, unlock more time-manipulation powers to solve increasingly complex levels. Use your powers sparingly, and you’ll please the Animal Spirits.

name: The Secret of Whispering
description: Sin descripción

name: RetroRealms Double Feature: Halloween + Ash vs. Evil Dead
description: Step into a 16-bit Pixel Art world filled with gory good fun as horror legends Michael Myers and Ash Williams! Slice and shoot your way across multiple levels of terrifying platformer action filled with familiar sights and sounds from the original “Halloween” film and the STARZ television series “Ash vs Evil Dead!” Test your skill, use your weapons, and confront twisted and fiendish versions of iconic characters in two separate games that can be connected for even more fun. Engage in epic, heart-pounding encounters to overcome the ultimate evil in this sprawling adventure filled with over-the-top terror!

name: Exit Terminal
description: Could you Exit Terminal?

name: Rookie Boxing
description: Realistic local multiplayer Boxing game

name: Stick Combat: Fighting Platformer
description: Defeat Enemies and Overcome Obstacles—Master the Platform with Precision and Parkour!

name: Touhou Renkyouto: Subterranean Festival of Love and Jealousy
description: Touhou Renkyouto is a top-down bullet hell title starring the green-eyed Parsee Mizuhashi. Adventure from from the Underworld to the surface and back again to solve an incident involving stray spirits causing chaos, and maybe help Parsee realize her love along the way.

name: Mariana
description: You are dropped into an unknown trench to explore. You will find fantastical creatures and rare artifacts. Fight bosses and mini-bosses in order to dive as deep as possible and uncover the mystery of the trench.

name: No Happy Days
description: A short RPG with only one fight. Uncover the truth of the past of the frogs.

name: Hot Wheels Monster Trucks: Stunt Mayhem - Deluxe Edition
description:
Hot Wheels Monster Trucks: Stunt Mayhem Deluxe Edition is the definitive arcade Monster Trucks experience, combining the full game with the exclusive Treasure Hunt Pack digital content. The Hot Wheels Monster Trucks: Stunt Mayhem Deluxe Edition includes:

- The full Hot Wheels Monster Trucks: Stunt Mayhem game that let's you GO BIG and perform insane stunts while smashing and bashing through fantastical arenas in your favorite monster trucks!
- Treasure Hunt Shuttle Monster Truck, and Glow Party Skin
- Treasure Hunt Rodger Dodger Skin
- Treasure Hunt Twin Mill Skin
- Exclusive Menu Soundtrack

name: Overwatch 2: My Hero Academia
description: Sin descripción

name: RetroRealms Arcade: Laurie Strode
description: Sin descripción

name: RetroRealms Arcade: Halloween Add-On
description: Sin descripción

name: RetroRealms Arcade: Kelly Maxwell
description: Expand your RetroRealmsTM adventure with Kelly Maxwell, younger, hotter, and with a much better fashion sense than Ash. Kelly comes with her own play style, weapons, story, and achievements! Overcome horrifying challenges and save humanity from the undead in this throwback to classic arcade action.

name: RetroRealms Arcade: Ash vs. Evil Dead Add-On
description: Sin descripción

name: RetroRealms Arcade
description: The RetroRealms Arcade connects select RetroRealms games with other titles in the series that you own (games and DLC sold separately) to unlock new access and abilities and create the ultimate mash-up of horror legends!

name: Dunk Trickster
description:
Let's play a game. A real game. On the real streets. The rule is simple - score.

You can't even imagine where streeball can be played. Discover all the locations for your best shot. Want to play at the airport? This is easy! Jump on the planes like it's your playground. Or do you want to break through the glass before the dunk? You can do it here!

name: The Seed: Unit 7
description: Farm for your future in a sci-fi twist on top-down life sim adventure!

name: Plus One
description: Plus One is an upcoming book to Choices. It is the first and thus far only book of the Plus One series.

name: Hot Wheels Monster Trucks: Stunt Mayhem
description: Packed with epic stunts and your fan-favorite monster trucks in action! You can smash, crash, and perform mind-blowing tricks across fantastical arenas in this adrenaline-fueled arcade adventure!

name: RetroRealms: Ash vs. Evil Dead
description: Step into the shoes of Ash Williams from the Starz television series Ash vs Evil Dead in a horrifying new Pixel Art platformer! Wielding both his trusty chainsaw and 12-guage shotgun, play as Ash and battle Deadite hordes across multiple levels of 16-bit gameplay filled with enemies from the Ash vs Evil Dead series. Journey into the Dark Realm to overcome additional challenges and save humanity from the Necronomicon in this groovy throwback to classic arcade action.

name: RetroRealms: Halloween
description: Step into the RetroRealms, a 16-bit Pixel Art world, and take control of classic horror icon Michael Myers! Fight your way across multiple levels of platformer action filled with sights and sounds inspired by the original Halloween film. Slice your way through Haddonfield, face-off in epic Boss battles against familiar faces from the movie, and overcome blood-soaked challenges in this intense retro throwback to classic arcade action!

name: Arch Legends
description: Arch Legends is a classic RPG full of stories and maps to explore, focused on hunting for treasure and killing monsters. Build your own hero by challenging your limits and join thousands of players on this journey into a dark fantasy world. No micro-transactions! No cash shop!

name: It Could Happen to You
description: Your peaceful holiday is interrupted when the small village you’re visiting in becomes terrorized by strange lights on the sky and enigmatic men in black. Some villagers have gone missing, everyone is afraid. Dive into a thrilling adventure with branching narrative and a unique visual style.

name: Airspace Defender
description:
Defend your airspace in thrilling tabletop mixed reality!
Manage your city's defenses and protect your citizens by thwarting enemy attacks with carefully timed retaliatory strikes.

name: Soviet Anomaly 7
description: You are trapped in an endless soviet-era building.Observe your surroundings carefully to reach escape.Don't overlook any anomalies.If you find anomalies, turn back to downstairs.If you don't find anomalies, come to upstairs.

name: Kunkun League
description: Damn! Kunkun, unable to bear the humiliation from Xiao Hei, turned to Lao Da to learn basketball skills. Lao Da's challenge is to find exploding basketballs.

name: Presidents Tower Defense
description: Defend the Oval Office from an endless alien invasion by harnessing the abilities of your favorite (or least favorite) U.S. Presidents.

name: KeepUp Survival: Mountain Map
description: A small additional Free Mountain Map. Explore this cute little map, go hunting and build a nice shelter.

name: Spiritus Vindicta
description: Investigate haunted locations, collect evidence, and learn about dangerous ghosts in a spooky 2D ghost hunting experience.

name: Victim Complex
description: In this narrative-driven, first-person horror game, hack medium Jack Lognare discovers his first legitimate haunting. Initially thrilled to use his phony "ghost equipment" for real, he soon learns that the Entity that killed the inhabitants of the apartment complex has chosen him as its next target.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed
description: Embark on an pizza-fueled journey with Leonardo, Raphael, Donatello and Michelangelo to battle an all-new wave of havoc-wreaking mutants as you join forces with familiar faces in thrilling missions across the streets of NYC!

name: Start a Startup with a Legendary Japanese Warlord
description: A short visual novel with quizzes to help you dip your toes into the world of startups.

name: Hammer of Pain
description: Hammer Of Pain. Dive into a pixel-art, medieval adventure with Silver, the master blacksmith, and his huntress daughter, Nora. Their riveting tale of courage and heritage awaits you. Unfold their story, savor the detail, and get hooked on their world!

name: Sky Strikers VR
description: Sky Strikers merges sports excitement with immersive VR. Anticipate ball flight, boost with your rocket, and strike for the ultimate "moment" in sports gaming. Experience it for yourself!

name: Elven City Simulator
description: Revive civilization and save it from mysterious darkness. Story-oriented colony simulator with elvish flavor and indirect control.

name: A Hero's Rest
description: Immerse yourself into a fantasy world as the proprietor of a small town in a world abounding with Heroes and monsters. Build shops, craft items with hundreds of customization options and manage your resources wisely while making sure to ward off the dangers that surround the land of Felonia.

name: A Hero's Rest: An RPG Town Simulator
description: Build shops, craft items with hundreds of customization options, and manage your resources wisely to lead your Heroes to success. Immerse yourself as proprietor of a medieval fantasy town in a world abounding with Heroes and Monsters.

name: Gnome Online
description: Gnome Online is an innovative, Real-Time, fast-paced, PvP, Sandbox MMORPG.

name: Escape from the Trap World
description: Help our friend Hatdevil to get back to his world, passing through a world full of deadly traps.

name: Perfect Teams
description: Perfect Teams is a Rogue Like deckbuilder in which you have to assemble a team of three characters, each one with unique cards and unique powers, to explore different universes and fight the corruption caused by the fusion. What will be your Perfect Team?

name: Unknown 9: Awakening
description: You are Haroona, a Quaestor born with the ability to venture into a mysterious dimension: the Fold. On her quest for powerful hidden knowledge, she must learn to master the powers of the Fold to fight a secret society with a hostile agenda.

name: Valkyrie of Phantasm
description: Control characters from the Touhou Project series in this shooting action game featuring high-speed aerial versus combat! Danmaku battles faster than you've ever seen will unfold in the skies of Gensokyo as you use your mobility to dodge countless bullets flying at you with a variety of spells.

name: How to Make a Floating City
description: Manage and defend a "floating city" as its acting mayor! Featuring defensive shooting action with simple controls!

name: Pro Yakyuu Spirits: My Ballpark
description: Sin descripción

name: MechWarrior 5: Clans - Invasion Mech Patterns
description: MECHWARRIOR 5: CLANS Invasion Mech patterns. Unlock the Invasion Mech Patterns for 16 Clan Omnimechs. Customize your mechs with these unique designs and stand out on the battlefield.

name: MechWarrior 5: Clans - Digital Collectors Content
description: MECHWARRIOR 5: CLANS Digital Collectors Content Includes a Digital Art Book, the full Soundtrack, an Omnimech Technical Readout. Plus exclusive in-game content Platinum Mech Patterns and Timber Wolf WAR Omnimech with unique weapon loadout and skin.

name: World of Warships: Legends - Pilgrim From Devon
description: Strengthen your fleet with British Tier VII Premium cruiser Plymouth and get additional camouflages, Boosters, and Premium Account days.

name: Hell Let Loose: Panzer Lehr
description: Add the Panzer-Lehr Uniform DLC to your collection and be part of one of the most elite units in the entire German Wehrmacht. Take to the battlefield as both infantry and recon units.

name: Unknown 9: Awakening - Deluxe Edition
description: You are Haroona, a Quaestor born with the ability to venture into a mysterious dimension that overlaps our own, known only as the Fold. On her quest for powerful hidden knowledge, Haroona will learn to master her unique connection to the Fold, which allows her to channel its powers into our world... But such power does not go unnoticed and Haroona quickly becomes the target of a splinter faction calling themselves the Ascendants, who want to use the Fold to alter the course of human history.

name: MechWarrior 5: Clans - Digital Collectors Edition
description: MECHWARRIOR 5: CLANS Digital Collectors Edition includes MechWarrior 5: Clans and the Digital Collectors Content Add-on, featuring a Digital Art Book, the full soundtrack, an Omnimech Technical Readout, and exclusive in-game content: Platinum Mech Patterns and Timber Wolf WAR Omnimech with unique weapon loadout and skin.

name: The Arkane Collection
description: The Arkane Collection includes Dishonored: Definitive Edition, Dishonored 2, Dishonored: Death of the Outsider, Prey, Prey: Mooncrash, Typhon Hunter, Redfall and DEATHLOOP Deluxe Edition!

name: Indian Princess: Dress Up!
description: Become a stylist and design traditional and modern Indian outfits! Create typical looks that are unique for weddings and festive events, showing all your creativity.

description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Eggconsole Undeadline MSX2
description: A fantasy-themed action shooting game with a high level of difficulty, but it's a well-crafted title that offers a satisfying and challenging experience.

name: Hentai Girls: Autumn Crush
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: The Body Cam Project
description:
The BODY CAM project is an exciting first-person team shooter that puts players in the
shoes of elite law enforcement officers equipped with surveillance cameras. The action takes place in a city overrun by criminal syndicates, and players must work together to restore justice and order by completing a number of responsible missions.

name: Holy Shift
description: A short psychological adventure about decisions and choices that will change your future. A visual novel about how you ended up in purgatory and met a Succubus.

name: Arcade Archives: Violence Fight
description:
"VIOLENCE FIGHT" is a fighting game released by TAITO in 1989.
The game takes place in America of the early 1960s . Fighters gather from all parts of the USA to get the winning money and the honor by defeating all their opponents in the VIOLENCE FIGHT!

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 14
description: Roguery rules the waves in Sea of Thieves Season 14: Making Mischief!

name: Half Billion: Love Choice - 2K DLC
description: After downloading, the game graphics can be upgraded to 2K high-definition picture quality

name: Half Billion: Love Choice
description: "Half Billion" is a surreal simulation business interactive game, where you will complete the entrepreneurial journey with a start-up capital of half billion. Six beauty enter your life. How will you balance the relationship? Note that "wealth" and "likability" will jointly determine the your story.

name: Plerbtonia
description: Plerbtonia is a Plutonia megawad featuring 32 relatively short, difficult maps intended to be played pistol-start.﻿ Most of the maps are done by Plerb, with a couple guest maps from RiviTheWarlock and OverflowingMocha.

name: Blips
description: Blips is a remake of the dos bips game made by Bryant Brownell, its a sokoban style puzzle game but with exploding dynamite and collecting coins

name: Blindfire
description: Blindfire is the first FPS game set in complete darkness. Rely on your insincts to eliminate your opponents. It's either hunt or be hunted... Ready to light 'em up?

name: Garden Snap
description: A relaxing game where you can remove alien plants to restore the forest. No quests or enemies, just relaxing. You can also change the weather if you prefer rain. Alternatively, you can also just walk around in nature in a peaceful forest.

name: Captain of the Guard
description: You have been charged with the defense of a new settlement in a hostile land. Prepare your guards and send them into battle against the horde of creatures that stalk the wilderness. As time passes and the settlement grows, so do the threats that you face.

name: Paraedolon
description:
A short experimental experience.

A meteor approaches Earth from deep space. Carrying an unknown malevolent force.

name: .Redrum
description: .redruM is a psychological horror game blending realism and visual experimentation. Inspired by liminal spaces, backrooms, and real crime scenes, you play as a photographer uncovering the identity behind gruesome murders. .redruM is the red room where unshared photos are developed.

name: Records of the Flycatcher
description: The empire of Hadria has turned its war machine against the vulnerable eastern hinterlands of Altheim. With only your sniper rifle on your back, and a few strips of rabbit meat in your pocket, you must defend the motherland and wage a lone guriella war against the overwhelming tide of invaders.

name: Amelia’s Garden
description: Repair these pots and start a brand new rooftop garden!

name: Supermarket Grocery Simulator
description: Supermarket Cashier Manager

name: MetroLand
description: MetroLand is a new endless runner that takes what you know and love about the classic endless runner and turns it up to 11!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Planetary Rewind
description:
Version 7.8 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes
• New Part 2 Story Chapter V: The First and Last War
• New Part 2 Open World: Langqiu, 100 Years Ago
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Lone Planetfarer (Vita)
• New Featured Event: Wilderness Development Logs
• Expanded LITE Function
• ...and more!

name: Bundle: Memory - The Original Matching Game from Ravensburger + Rush Hour Deluxe: The Ultimate Traffic Jam Game!
description:
memory: The game that unites and delights generations!
Rush Hour Deluxe: The ingenious logic game.

name: Dungeons 4: Nintendo Switch Edition
description:
Follow the Evil Way and foster the return of the Absolute Evil!
Having to deal with a newborn, dwarves, and her obnoxious stepbrother, wasn’t quite what Thalya had hoped for.

name: Fruit Party: Suika Casual Puzzle
description: A fun and challenging match puzzle game where you have to match colorful fruits to make them bigger!

name: Football League Cup: Arcade Soccer Simulator
description: Exciting football simulator - take on the role of a coach, assemble your own football team and fight your way to the top of the tournament table!

name: Pharaoh's Riches
description:
Toss coins and explore the mysteries of Ancient Egypt!
The pharaoh's golden riches await you!

name: Starship Troopers: Continuum
description: It’s 25 years since the Battle of Klendathu, and the war between the Federation and the Arachnid is deadlocked. But the planet Janus-4 holds a secret that threatens to tip the balance of the war - one way or the other.

name: Anime Puzzle Quest: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pod Jam
description:
Pod Jam is a retro-inspired puzzle game where you guide alien pods to safe landings through strategic planning. Each level presents unique challenges with arrows that interact differently with the environment, requiring careful sequencing to prevent pods from getting stuck.

Offering 100 increasingly challenging levels, Pod Jam offers a blend of challenge and satisfaction. The ambient sci-fi soundtrack and minimalist retro visuals create an immersive experience. Easy to learn but hard to master, the game is a perfect title for logic puzzle and brain-teaser lovers.

name: Puzzle Master: Complete DLC Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Astro Bot: Stellar Speedway
description:
Free DLC that brings new speedrun levels and bots to rescue. It has weekly release schedule:

- Oct 17: Building Speed
- Oct 24: Let it Slide
- Oct 31: Spring-loaded Run
- Nov 7: Helium Heights
- Nov 14: Rising Heat

Each new level offers two brand-new Special Bots for you to rescue.

name: Velvet 89
description: How did the communist regime in Czechoslovakia fall? This hidden-object game tells the story of ordinary people taking part in the peaceful demonstrations that changed the course of history. Big crowds hide those, who want to tell you why they took to the streets.

name: Arizona Sunshine Remake
description: Arizona Sunshine Remake elevates the original, award-winning game, completely rebuilt with GORE-geous VR graphics and next-gen VR combat and weapons. Face the undead alone or with up to three fellow survivors in a post-apocalyptic southwestern America overrun by zombies.

name: Woxin Jianghu
description: A massively multiplayer online game (MMORPG) independently developed by me is also a continuation of a childhood dream, I hope it can make everyone feel happy and communicate with each other! I also hope that all game lovers will give me more advice, and I will try my best to improve...

name: Mad & Max: The Best Survival Game with Zombies and Dinosaurs
description: Welcome to the Apocalypse! Do dinosaurs rule the earth? Not only them, but also zombies! Why? Because they can.

name: Maestro
description: Step into a gorgeous opera house with Maestro, the VR orchestra conducting rhythm game that's the essence of elegance, control, and high-society french sophistication.

name: Super Mario Party Jamboree
description:
Get ready for the biggest party yet in Super Mario Party Jamboree for Nintendo Switch. From running through merry-go-rounds to motion-control minigolf, this jamboree is jam-packed with over 110 minigames – the most of any Mario Party game to date!

With seven boards in all, you can go with the flow in Goomba Lagoon, search for stars in Rainbow Galleria, revisit the classics of Western Land and Mario’s Rainbow Castle from past titles and more.

Race across the party board in Koopathlon, a series-first 20-player online competition to see who can rack up the highest scores in minigames like the fast-paced Lane Change. The higher your score in each round, the faster you’ll get to the goal. Koopathlon is just one of a slew of additional modes – there’s something for every kind of Mario Party player to enjoy!

name: Killing Time: Resurrected
description: Journey into a mansion on the Island of Matinicus where you'll arrive to find the mansion full of hellacious demonic creatures. Solve deadly puzzles, uncover the secrets behind a famous mystery and discover an ancient artifact from the Pharaoh Ramses, if you can live long enough to find it.

name: In Memoriam
description: Put your detective skills to the test, walk freely around the scene like a ghost, listening to the conversations and audio clues, discover the truth in each case and solve the mystery, how did you die?

name: Arsene Lupin: Once a Thief
description: Witness the Origins of a Legend - Experience Arsène Lupin's transformation from humble burglar to folklore hero in Arsène Lupin: Once A Thief, a detective adventure game set in the early 1900s.

name: Highland Huntress
description: Take on waves of mystical creatures and survive the highland trials in Highland Huntress! This bullet heaven blends roguelite and casual elements, featuring archery combat, dynamic weather, and a quest to find your fox kit. Explore lush landscapes and strategize to overcome relentless hordes.

name: Tales From The Arcade: Fartmania
description: Welcome to the whimsical world of "Fartmania"! Get ready to embark on an unforgettable journey through the skies with our unconventional hero – a pig who defies gravity with the power of flatulence!

name: Fowl Swarm
description: Just another day at the farm, face seemingly endless swarms of killer chickens. They will keep coming, you can't hide. Survive for as long as you can...

name: Clawball
description: Clawball is a Cat vs Cat VR Soccer Game. Use your hands to run, climb, jump and "kick" the ball in this multiplayer game developed by the creators of the Pixel Ripped franchise ARVORE Immersive Experiences

name: Exocars
description: Immerse yourself in the adrenaline-pumping world of VR racing! Strap into EXOcars and compete against real players in asynchronous multiplayer mode. Show off your skills as the ultimate VR racer!

name: A Quiet Place: The Road Ahead
description: A Quiet Place: The Road Ahead is a single-player horror adventure game inspired by the critically acclaimed blockbuster movie franchise that highlights a unique survivor story after an invasion of deadly creatures. In this exclusive spin-off, experience the journey of a young woman who must endure a treacherous apocalypse in the midst of interpersonal family conflicts, all while coming to terms with her own inner fears.

name: Toby's Topsy Tale
description: Toby's Topsy Tale is a cute 3D platformer, with heavy elements of psychological horror, where you explore colorful worlds filled with quirky characters, dangerous enemies, and Lovecraftian nightmares!

name: Confronted
description: A terrifying first-person survival horror game where building cover to hide is your only refuge against the unspeakable terrors within Radu Castle.

name: Valince Genesis: VR
description: Immerse yourself in 'Valince Genesis: VR' as Detective Sinclair. A routine investigation leads you to the opulent Crimson View Hotel. Uncover the truth behind a mysterious disappearance in a storyline full of twists. Explore, decide, and survive using guns and tools. Can you escape?

name: Aery: Midnight Hour
description: In Aery – Midnight Hour you play a little bird on its journey to the devils Halloween party after hearing Dracula talk about it. Enjoy your journey as a little bird and enjoy the feeling of flying while exploring a whole world filled with beautiful, and scary little secrets.

name: Citadelum
description: Citadelum is a city builder set in legendary Ancient Rome. Build your own settlement, gather resources and evolve it into a magnificent city. Explore the world, trade and lead your mighty legions in epic tactical battles. Earn the favor of the Gods or challenge them, if you dare.

name: Cats Hidden in Germany
description: Find 100 cats hiding in the cozy medieval Germany in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game.

name: Age of Empires Mobile
description: Embark on an exhilarating adventure in the brand-new Age of Empires world and forge unbreakable bonds with friends anytime and anywhere! Dive into an epic war strategy experience with rich real-time controls, stunning visuals and historical heroes on grand battlefields. Seize the reins of your empire, rally allies from every corner of the globe, and reclaim your once radiant glory!

name: Brave and Desire
description: Brave and Desire is a party battle roguelite RPG with a structure and events that change every time you start! Advance through the dungeon using a route selection system and aim to step through the innermost part of the dungeon!

name: MechWarrior 5: Clans
description: MechWarrior 5: Clans follows a Star of Clan Smoke Jaguar warriors during Operation Revival, a full-scale invasion of the Inner Sphere. Armed with an arsenal of cutting-edge BattleMechs, meticulously designed maps and missions deliver immersive and intricate tactical gameplay and combat experiences.

name: Sniper Killer
description: Eliminate your victims as a serial killer dubbed ‘The Sniper Killer’. Terrorize the city with your keen eye and thirst for blood while staying one step ahead of a detective hell bent on bringing you to justice.

name: King Arthur: Legends Rise
description: Embark on a dark squad RPG journey inspired by King Arthur's perilous adventures. Gather loyal heroes, explore a vast world, and battle against mythical bosses and monsters to restore the kingdom's former glory.

name: Mask Quest
description: A platform game about running, jumping and breathing.

name: Blazing Strike
description: Inspired by classic arcade fighting game series from industry greats such as Capcom and SNK, the upcoming 2D fighting game from developer RareBreed Makes Games is Blazing Strike evokes the excitement and nostalgia of 2D pixel art genre pioneers while incorporating a unique games system with modern mechanics.

name: Terrordrome: Reign of the Legends
description:
Terrordrome - Reign Of The Legends, the first horror fighting game with classic monsters, urban legends and mythological creatures.
Horror icons and urban legends clash in a battle to the death in this original fighting game from the TerrorTeam. Reign Of The Legends explores legends, folklore, myths and the paranormal both in its characters and stages, while incorporating conspiracy theories as the base material for its storyline. Legends and icons are re-imagined in a story set in the 20th century, continuing the legacy of many of the world's favorite monsters and cryptids.

description: In this Super JM Neto Game Dev Bundle contains 03 Platform Games (06 Games / Xbox and Windows Versions).
