name: Colorfull Games Bundle
description: In this Xbox Bundle, explore colorful platformers like Sunbeam Feast, a precision game full of challenges; Little Bear, where a brave bear cub searches for honey in a fantasy world; and Slime Ranger, a strategy game where every move counts to defeat the Slime King.

name: Hard Platformers Bundle
description: In this Xbox Bundle, you'll find some of the hardest platform games, including Ducky Dash, a nostalgic tribute to retro portable games with a monochromatic green palette, and Dark Elven Legacy, where Elynar, an elven archer, embarks on a sacred quest to recover ancient relics.

name: WWE 2K24 Bray Wyatt Bundle
description: The WWE 2K24 Bray Wyatt Bundle includes WWE 2K24 Standard Edition and the Bray Wyatt Edition Pack featuring the debut of a brand-new playable version of "The Fiend", in-game Bray Wyatt action figure. Let him in.

name: Red Panda is Hungry
description: Follow the journey of a gluttonous red panda that is willing to risk everything if it means more food. Walk, jump and slide through a bamboo forest full of traps and dangers until your reach the legendary all you can eat bamboo buffet.Re d

name: Quartz Caverns
description:
Quartz Caverns is an action-adventure puzzle game where you guide the main character through a series of ancient caves in search of mystical crystals. The caverns are filled with tricky puzzles, dangerous slimes, and other hazards that test your wits and reflexes. As you explore, you'll uncover hidden paths, discover powerful relics, and face numerous threats lurking in the shadows. Only the bravest can retrieve the legendary crystals and uncover the secrets of the Quartz Caverns.

Are you up for the challenge?

name: The Shadow
description: Sin descripción

name: Knock Knock
description: Sin descripción

name: Forsaken
description: A short, psychological narrative experience, where you play as Ben. The events in the game are not linear, which means that you have to piece together some events, that will occur during the gameplay. Set on an island and involves fishing elements.

name: Model Debut3 #Nicola
description: A fashion game where your unique, cute style comes to life!

name: Temehuatzl
description: A morning stroll through a slightly hazy, partially flooded jungle temple.

name: Tilting Tiles: Fires of Industry
description: Sin descripción

name: The Patient
description: Dr. Ellen Reed returns to work as a therapist only to discover an inpatient has been mistakenly dosed with a deadly mutative drug. With hospital records erased due to a power outage, she must work overnight to identify and discreetly euthanize the affected patient before it's too late.

name: OVR Dynamic Resolution
description: OVR Dynamic Resolution is a lightweight OpenVR app that dynamically adjusts your HMD's resolution depending on your GPU frametime, CPU frametime and VRAM in order to maintain your target FPS and/or maximize resolution.

name: The Memory In Walden Pond
description: Imitate ancient Chinese,In the bamboo forest landscape, survival hunting, farming herding horses, fishing qiao Jiang Zhu, build their own peach blossom source.

name: Poly Fire
description: Poly Fire is a tactical multiplayer team 1st person shooter. Using a variety of weapons and characters, you will battle with up to 32 players on Various maps . By managing your skills correctly, you will lead your team to victory.

name: Place of Decay
description: Explore a corrupted game project in this horror-puzzle adventure. Uncover the mystery behind its collapse and the developer's abandonment. Use the Code Cannon to break through the digital barriers and navigate the chaotic realm to uncover the truth behind its downfall.

name: Clone Your Way Out
description: Embark on a retro sci-fi journey in "Clone Your Way Out," a puzzle side-scroller with nostalgic pixel art. You'll control clones escaping from a mysterious lab, using a Clone Gun to solve deadly puzzles and traps. Enjoy retro visuals and unique cloning mechanics as you guide your clones to freedom.

name: Beyond Border
description: Help Aki the alligator find his way home in Beyond Border! Navigate through four challenging stages – from the mysterious Forest to the spooky Cemetery. Each stage brings new enemies and obstacles, such as sticky slimes and giant spiders, that will test your survival skills.

name: Road to Champion: Boxing Simulator
description: "Road To Champion: Boxing Simulator" is an exciting simulation of the boxing world. Shape your career, decorate your home, customize your car, and fight your way to becoming a champion!

name: Macie's Magic Melee
description: Macie wants more plushies! Who could say no to their loving daughter? Battle, dash, and shoot through a magical arena to win. Collect items to boost your odds against the arena's enemies and secure a swift victory. Best of luck!

name: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 2024-2025
description:
The "Professional Baseball Spirits" series is a professional baseball game that pursues realism.

The first home game, "Professional Baseball Spirits 2004,'' was released on March 25, 2004. "Professional Baseball Spirits 2015" introduces 3D scanning technology that photographs professional baseball players from 360 degrees and reproduces them three-dimensionally.

Furthermore, we have also adopted laser scanning technology that measures the precise shape of the stadium, allowing you to enjoy a realistic baseball experience with overwhelming expressiveness.

name: Eden Crafters
description: Embark on a journey of survival, crafting, and automation in Eden Crafters, a co-op, open-world game that challenges you to turn a hostile planet into a habitable haven for humanity. Temper the climate, create a breathable atmosphere, and turn toxic lakes into water: shape a new world!

name: Kill the Reaper
description: Reaper losing control over the taken souls and now all hell breaks loose.Hold back armies of the dead and find out, how long does it take to Kill the Reaper?

name: Pancake Patrol
description: Embark on a pancake-fueled roguelite adventure! Defeat thousands of monsters with food-based weaponry, face bullet hell bosses, & explore diverse game modes. Choose from 10 characters, conquer Boss Rush challenges, fight 1v1 boss battles, & join the Pancake Patrol!

name: Passageway of the Ancients
description: Mystery, battle, and a lost relic. This fantasy RPG takes players through the intricate world of Arion, the galaxy’s last magical planet. Solve your parents’ murder as you explore the city of Ithgar – all the while hiding your Dragonkindt nature.

name: Nairi: Rising Tide
description: The story continues in the highly anticipated second chapter of NAIRI. In this graphic adventure, Nairi pushes onward on a perilous quest to save her family, leaving the Tower of Shirin's grimy slums behind in this exciting all-new sequel!

name: Glitchpunk
description: Inspired by classic top-down action games, Glitchpunk lets you brawl, shoot and drive your way through a dystopian future. As an android bounty hunter in a brutal world of gangs, cults and corporations there’s plenty of work for you. Lock and load, let her rip!

name: Mega Platformer Bundle
description:
In this Bundle, you will find our main platform games for Xbox.
Mr. T-Shirt, with adventures in a paper world; Ducky Dash, a tribute to retro portable games; Little Bear, featuring a bear cub searching for honey; and Sunbeam Feast, a challenging precision platformer.

name: Masters of Fate Bundle: Bio Inc. Redemption & Cultist Simulator: Anthology
description: Shape destinies, command life and death - embrace the power of fate.

name: MX vs. ATV: Legend - Reflex Pack
description: Compete on 6 fan favourite events from MX vs ATV Reflex!

name: Bonk The Goblins!
description: Bonk the Goblins! is Whackamole meets microgames! It's full of hectic and funny score attack arcade action.

name: 9 R.I.P. Aroma Edition
description: Aroma Edition Includes: 9 R.I.P for Nintendo Switch, Reversible Cover Sleeve, Collector’s Boxes, Acrylic Standee (reveals an image when lit up!), set of 9 Character Cards, Cloth Poster, Dark Sweet Dreams Aroma Diffuser

name: One Night: Burlesque - Angels Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: One Night: Burlesque - People Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: One Night: Burlesque - Sins Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Hogwarts Legacy + Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions Deluxe Editions Bundle
description: The Ultimate Wizarding Bundle delivers the best gaming experience the wizarding world has to offer.

name: Venator Universe
description: Venator Universe is a sci-fi RPG survival game developed by VenatorGames. It aims to create a highly action-packed and hostile environment. The goal of the game is to survive, which requires players to gather resources, craft items, and improve themselves.

name: Gris + Neva Bundle
description:
The GRIS + Neva Bundle offers players the opportunity to experience two acclaimed titles from Nomada Studio.

The bundle was released on October 15, 2024, coinciding with the launch of Neva

name: Just Dance 2025: Ultimate Edition
description:
The party never ends with the Ultimate Edition with thirteen months of Just Dance+* and digital bonus unicorn pack.

Get your friends and family together to let loose on Just Dance! Whether you want to party, exercise, or create special family moments, Just Dance 2025 Edition has something for everyone with 40 hot new songs, including an exclusive song pack with Ariana Grande.

name: Just Dance 2025: Deluxe Edition
description:
The party never ends with the Deluxe Edition with four months of Just Dance+* and digital bonus unicorn pack.

Get your friends and family together to let loose on Just Dance! Whether you want to party, exercise, or create special family moments, Just Dance 2025 Edition has something for everyone with 40 hot new songs, including an exclusive song pack with Ariana Grande.

name: Delve Diver
description: Fall-down platformer with Auto-generated stages. Obtain items to help your journey - but beware, you should only bring what you can lose.

name: Madden NFL 25 Mobile Football
description: The newest season of Madden NFL Mobile is here! Build your Ultimate Team of NFL superstars and put your football skills to the test anytime, anywhere.

name: Climb Knight
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legacy of Robin Hood
description: Robin Hood's daily routine is interrupted by the arrival of a foreign messenger announcing a tournament hosted by the enigmatic Duke DeMontfort.

name: Captain Barrel
description: Collect all treasure and get the highest score in this pirate platorfming epic though the seven seas!

name: Dai-chan's Great Adventure: World's End
description:
Flowing rivers, rushing waterfalls, unexplored towering trees...
Nitori's adventure begins here and now!

name: Bankiware
description: This game was created in a short period of time for the Touhou Game Jam 2024.

name: Buckshot to Hell
description: Russian roulette game where you can have fun with friends or compete with other people!

name: Siren
description: Sin descripción

name: Helicopter Flight Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Reflection Seeker
description: Sin descripción

name: Gamer Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Scary Bucketman
description: Sin descripción

name: I've Fallen For You!
description: Eight women simultaneously appear in your life, offering you unconditional love and support! Will you choose to uphold your beliefs and become a good man, or give in to human temptations and become a bad man?

name: Trailcam
description: In Trailcam, you are a wildlife investigator called to the Appalachian Mountains to solve mysterious missing person cases. Using trail cameras from your watchtower, you'll uncover a sinister truth, navigating a non-linear plot full of twists. Can you solve the mystery?

name: Yugo: The Non-game
description: Yugo: the non-game is a virtual space where you can drive a car, listen to the radio, and invite people to talk and share the experience with.

name: Multiplayer Ninjas
description: Multiplayer Ninjas - The village is under attack, grab Your sword and go get 'em! (Multiplayer or Single Player)

name: Archero 2
description: The once-great hero has fallen into the Demon King's trap and turned into an even more powerful leader of dark forces! As a new-generation hero, you must master every skill you acquire to embark on your mission to save the world.

name: Tombstone Tally
description: Tombstone Tally is a cross between bingo and a scavenger hunt where you check off squares based on ridiculous tombstones. Play with your friends! Smack them around with a shovel and challenge them on three maps, including a fast paced arena mode!

name: Overwatch 2: Season 13 - Spellbinder
description: Bewitch the battlefield with Mythic Spellbinder Widowmaker, the new Junkenstein's Laboratory Halloween Terror mode, a My Hero Academia collab, and more!

name: ChessRogue
description: A chess themed roguelike featuring online high scores.

name: Asylum of the Forsaken
description: Asylum of the Forsaken is a gripping horror survival game. Play as Nathan Scott, an investigative journalist exploring the abandoned Ravenwood Asylum. Search for clues, solve dark puzzles, and avoid a relentless entity. Uncover the asylum's terrifying secrets and survive the horrors in the shadows.

name: Railway Empire 2: India
description:
Railway Empire 2 – India whisks you into a gorgeous new era. Discover vast, vibrant plains, roaming elephants and bustling mega-cities, all waiting to be transformed by the blessings of the railroad.
Beginning in the Golden Era of the East India Company, you will help establish a vast railway system within the Indian subcontinent. Should you succeed, your network will become a roaring motor for growth, trade, administration and military control over India. However, a few decades later, the grip of the East India Company is waning. Work together with the British Crown while forging your own path for a prosperous railway infrastructure in the west.

name: Dino Crisis
description: Experience Dino Crisis originally released on the PlayStation, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: 100 Wars
description: The game mode is unpredictable like a kaleidoscope,and every opening is a brand new adventure. Sudden events are like surprise soldiers or mysterious Easter eggs, every shot is full of variables, and every decision is crucial. Multiple roles, multiple skills, multiple weapons, and multiple teammates

name: Captured
description: Trapped in what appears to be an endless hallway in your home, rooms begin to feel unfamiliar. Spot the differences, capture the anomalies, and stay away from any sinister entities.

name: DayZ: Frostline
description: Embark on an unforgiving journey in DayZ's Frostline Expansion, set within the icy Sakhal archipelago, covering 83km² of winter wilderness. Face new challenges, manage the cold, and discover the beauty and peril of Sakhal. Coming Fall 2024. Prepare to survive.

name: Ember Knights: Wrath of the Architect
description: The Wrath of the Architect DLC opens a portal to a new dimension! It is your mission to battle through four altered worlds filled with deadly new monsters and bosses… with the fate of reality itself at stake!

name: City Bus Simulator
description: Buckle up and navigate the streets—and skies—like a pro city bus driver!

name: Just Dance 2025 Edition
description:
Get your friends and family together to let loose on Just Dance! To party, exercise, or create special family moments, Just Dance 2025 Edition has something for everyone, with 40 hot new songs.

Need a fun way to exercise? Start your own routine with the Workout Mode and keep yourself motivated by tracking the calories burnt and the time spent dancing. Use Workout Mode to enjoy a dance workout in solo or with your family and friends!

name: Roulette to Hell
description: It is a Russian Roulette game. Roulette is played with shotguns according to certain rules, the last survivor wins. There are multiple game modes. Where you can have fun with your friends or compete with other people.

name: Nikoderiko: The Magical World
description: Join Niko and Luna on their quest in Nikoderiko, a vibrant platform adventure. When the duo discovers an ancient relic on a magical island, the villainous Grimbald of the Cobring Gems Company snatches it away. To save the island and its tribes, they must navigate seven unique worlds with the help of their animal friends and defeat the Cobring army. With family-friendly design, couch co-op, and music by David Wise, Nikoderiko promises a magical, mysterious journey for all ages.

name: New World: Aeternum
description: Aeternum is separate from the original New World but also contains everything from New World and its Rise of the Angry Earth expansion, retooled for consoles, and featuring a slew of changes and additions that go beyond what you'd expect in just an update.

name: Aaero2
description: Speed through stunning alien worlds tracing ribbons of light to release the energy in the music. Fly solo or team up with a friend. Encounter strange enemies and giant boss creatures. Unleash devastating missile barrages and rain heavy cannon fire to the beat of the epic soundtrack from Monstercat.

name: Super Alice Dolls!
description:
SUPER ALICE DOLLS! is a 2D platform action game , Touhou Project fan game, crafted with the adorable essence of Alice is Cute!
Alice will use the abilities of various dolls to conquer the level.

name: Super Chroma Bots: Season One
description: Control a team of color based robots in the technologically advanced city of NeoTechropolis. As the robots harness the power of their unique colors to overcome challenges, they must unite to stop an imminent global threat.

name: Neva
description:
Neva is an action-adventure game developed by Nomada Studio and published by Devolver Digital.
The gameplay combines side-scrolling platforming with environmental puzzles and combat.
Neva has been praised for its stunning art style, emotional storytelling, and refined gameplay mechanics, building upon the foundation laid by GRIS.

name: Just Dance VR
description: Just Dance VR is a dancing game that contains 360° iconic universes. Just Dance VR is a place to have fun with your friends & all dancers from around the world thanks to private or public matchmaking.

name: Turbo Fat
description: A tasty twist on the classic block stacker! Spin, squish and combine pieces to serve up delicious desserts. Explore 100 scrumptious levels, each with unique surprises and hilarious gimmicks. Grow your restaurant empire with the mysterious Fat Sensei, catering to a cast of colorful creatures.

name: Grapple Gunners
description: A fast-paced multiplayer experience about grappling hooks and guns! Play against friends and compete to be the winner in this action-packed PvP game! Fight to be the last one standing across 30 unique maps!

name: Drova: Forsaken Kin
description: Drova is a pixel art role-playing game inspired by classic role-playing games. We want to create a challenging and interesting world and offer a well-rounded and consistent gaming experience.

name: New World: Aeternum - Deluxe Edition
description: Experience a thrilling action RPG set on the supernatural island of Aeternum in the twilight of the Age of Exploration. As a shipwrecked explorer who washes ashore on the mysterious island, forge your destiny on an adventure filled with danger and opportunity.

name: Shoot on Sight
description: The System built a world of injustice and oppression. Pressed up against the wall, it now fights for its survival. Uphold the law as an elite police officer or join the Stagers to liberate the world, defining the future of society in this multiplayer isometric tactical shooter!

name: Hand-Holding Simulator
description: An incremental idle game that is sure to make you feel love again. Synergize your Love Languages to produce a seemingly endless amount of satisfaction for you and your partner

name: Rocket League: Painted Power Bundle
description: The Painted Power bundle is available for a limited time! Unlock Gold Painted Octane, Gold Painted Dueling Dragons Goal Explosion, and more Painted Black Market and Exotic items.

name: The Spirit Guide
description: Play as the titular Spiritguide Ale in this beautiful top down 2D pixel art RPG. It's the night of the day of the dead festival, and families both celebrate and mourn their loved ones. You must take their gifts, and good memories and deliver it to the Spirits, so they may never forget who they are.

name: Hentai Golf: Complete +
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Stars: Complete +
description: Sin descripción

name: Bona Fido
description: Sin descripción

name: Abducted Toad: 10th Anniversary Edition!
I Love Finding Wild Friends: Collector's Edition
description: Discover lovable wild animals in this thrilling hidden object game!

name: Princess Snow White: The Enchanted Mirror
description: Peace has reigned in the castle and the forest for several years, but a new threat begins to emerge from the dark past of the Evil Queen.

name: Mix AI Animal Ultimate
description: Sin descripción

name: Pizza Delivery Survivors
description: Experience the thrill of pizza delivery in a zombie apocalypse! "Pizza Delivery Survivors" combines survival, strategy, and fast-paced action. Deliver pizzas, outsmart the undead, and turn everyday items into weapons to fight for survival.

name: Stretchy Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Pop It!
description:
Pop It! is an arcade game that consists of exploding the entire batch of vertical balloons with a single shot.

As you explode them, more will appear and it will become increasingly difficult for you to be at the top of the leaderboard!

name: A Work of Art
description: A dark, witty, psychological thriller in the horror genre, A Work of Art presents a 1-2 hour story-driven experience with Visual Novel features and RPG elements. Follow a colorful cast of quirky characters through a twisted tale of beauty and darkness; All to the sound of a Dark Original soundtrack.

name: Tres
description: Tres is a cards-based game where you, with another player, have to compete againt each other to see wich one is the first to put on the table all of their cards.

name: Sketchy Marathon
description: Platform in a world that's drawn for you! A 2D endless platformer game where you must evade obstacles drawn by a rogue pencil! Explore a variety of biomes while improving your high score and collecting hats along the way.

name: Monkeys & Typewriters!
description: Ever heard of those million chimps with a million typewriters writing the collected works of Shakespeare? Guess what, you're that monkey! Join Typo the Monkey in this rogue relax simulator which allows you to generate any type of story you can think of, explore and win it, and share it with others!

name: Concentration
description: Enjoy the classic card game of concentration!

name: Little Warriors Team
description: The Little Warriors team includes gameplay such as character development, material collection, equipment synthesis, and challenging bosses. The game allowing players to form battle teams according to their preferences and freely switch between controlled characters during battles.

name: Lamentations
description: You and your teammates are part of an elite undercover unit tasked with finding out information on a mysterious complex known as "the backrooms". Explore various locations, solve puzzles, check your six, and escape with your life!

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XVII: Feathered Fury
description: Help Hercules stop a comet from destroying Earth! Explore Aztec temples, solve puzzles, and meet the legendary Quetzalcoatl!

name: Quantum Sleeper
description: Research Facility G-1-6 has gone dark. Your mission: reestablish contact and investigate the communication blackout. Equipped with AEGIS-scanner and a flashlight, uncover what is really going on here.

name: Little Hooky
description: Little Hooky is a tiny fishing game for a little slack off. if there's nothing to stop you now then, Why don't you play a Little Hooky from work.

name: You Must Mop
description: You live alone. Someone is coming over. You must mop. Play as a raccoon who has to mop up the floor in anticipation of big changes.

name: Zaru
description: Explore a PSX-style horror game where your senses are your tools for survival. Sacrifice one sense for another to detect threats and make it out alive. Experience the sensory deprivation as you sneak throughout the warehouse, doing your last tasks for the night.

name: Custom Party
description: Custom Party is a free indie party-game. Players can use different powers (dash, explosion...) and have different stats based on their character customization. It introduces an innovative ranking system named «Take a Risk». The game allows everybody to play in the playstyle they want.

name: Fray
description: FRAY Game is a rhythm based puzzle game about two brothers Tullio and Ziya. Take control of Tullio to move to the beat and master energy blasting dance moves to light the way through a maze-like world of dance challenges and to battle cunning enemies who attempt to break the bond between brothers.

name: Doodle Harmony Idle Merge
description: Doodle Harmony Idle Merge is a cozy and relaxing idle game. Generate doodles or purchase them in the store. Customize your experience with a dark mode and a music selector. As you progress, you unlock new doodles, merge them to complete the doodle collection.

name: Burggeist
description:
Burggeist is a real-time action strategy that features the use of height differences and the terrains as part of your tactics.
Move around the field, quickly analyze the situation, choose the effective move to create and defend your Tower.

name: Enigma of Forest
description: Enigma Of Forest: 4v1 Werewolf Hunt Multiplayer Horror Game Unveil the mysteries of the darkness and prepare to survive! Enigma Of Forest: Delve into the forest with a group of 5 friends and witness the horrors of nature.

name: Backward Poiesis
description: A short walking simulator with a horror feel that recreates actual found footage, which can be related to Liminal Space and Backrooms.

name: Wings of Redemption
description: Wings of Redemption is rogue-lite top-down action game with focus on combining melee and ranged combat. Destroy hordes of monsters in randomly generated maps with variety of weapons on your way towards freedom.

name: Primal Rift
description: Turn-based, solo character roleplaying adventure set in a prehistoric world!

name: Up to Par
description: Up to Par is a run-based roguelite minigolf game. Stay under par, or you're out! Play solo or with up to 16 players through procedural levels, spend your spare shots to unlock abilities, and push your golf game to the limit across unique environments.

name: UpRunner
description: Uprunner is a free-to-play MMO vertical speedrunner. Win lobbies or create your own maps to earn coins and buy unique randomly generated skins!

name: The Dawn: Sniper's Way
description: The industrial city "Seversk" was abandoned after the 1981 flood, which led to a number of irreversible consequences at the nuclear power plant and research laboratories. Play as mercenaries, unite, act in your own or common interests.

name: Wizardry Variants: Daphne
description: Announced for the series 40th anniversary, Wizardry Variants: Daphne is a brand-new mobile RPG focused on unforgiving dungeon crawling and party building.

name: Tower of the Ice Lich
description: A pixelated homage to 16-bit RPGs, this former print-and-play card game has come full circle as a digital experience! Choose your champion, enter the tower, and make wise decisions on your ascent to face the Ice Lich at the top

name: Bricks Kingdom
description: In a realm where magic and mechanics have come together in perfect harmony, life thrives on the vibrant energy of Superbricks. Yet ominous clouds loom over this tranquil land of brick-builders. The mysterious Shadow Waves have their own plans for the power of these bricks, and it will take brave heroes to safeguard this power and save their world.

name: Gratis
description:
A shop has opened, the shopkeep has moved in, and shoppers need assistance. A quick salve, a trifle, salvation. Help them.

This is a short narrative horror-lite game that can be played in about 20-30 minutes with keyboard and mouse. Play multiple times to see all 11 characters!

name: GatePass
description: A 2D platformer game with strong puzzle elements. Escape the 100-level labyrinth and return home safely.

name: Anime Parody: Tentacle Slayer
description: Play as a tentacle monster, exploring a tragicomic love story from the perspective of a classic hentai villain. Encounter various QTE-style challenges without any jigsaw puzzles.

name: Bpop Attack
description: Sin descripción

name: Floyd Factory Jam
description: Floyd Factory Jam includes 11 maps (+ start), with the aim of creating factory type environments with no restriction on theme or texture set. The only requirement is that Floyd must be included on your factory's payroll. This jam is based on Alkaline.

name: Bitter Dream
description: Bitter Dream is a set of 10 MBF21 maps with all original music composed by LVENdead, intended to take you on a dark, cosmic journey with a variety of gameplay and a loose narrative thread. Maps start off easy and escalate to fairly challenging by the end by most reasonable measures. Bitter Dream will take most players between 5-6 hours to complete, as there are a few longer maps in the set. As such, it has been divided into 3 distinct Episodes.

name: Preekarity
description: PREEKARITY is a large and very challenging limit-removing single map for the DOOM II IWAD. UV players should expect to have their skills tested on all fronts: combat, movement, resource management, and navigation. Beware of resource starvation, combat puzzles, and general meanness. HMP and below are more forgiving and more focused on the "fun factor," but should still provide some spicy moments for non-Doomgods.

name: Bratty Bottoms!
description: Play as a hardworking newcomer hired to help manage the family-owned motel, run by the bratty yet endearing Lila.

name: World Rally Arcade
description: BRINGING THE ARCADE BACK TO RALLY

name: Broken Ceiling
description: Broken Ceiling is a hand drawn, 2D, top-down eldritch horror adventure video game. Set in deep dark caverns the main mechanic is the light field around the character that needs to be repeatedly recharged to be able to explore the secrets of the game.

name: Artovya
description: Dive into the bizarre land of Artovya in a thrilling CCG! Master five distinct factions—Fantasy, Alien, Futuristic, Horror, and Interdimensional. Forge your strategy with unique mechanics and thrilling battles across fantastical realms. Unleash your creativity, build your deck, and dominate!

name: Perfect World: Ascend
description:
Join players worldwide on the same server. Switch between landscape and portrait modes at will. The latest masterpiece from the 20-year classic IP “Perfect World” is now officially released globally!

[ Perfect World: Ascend ] offers a truly open 3D world with high freedom and diverse gameplay.
Choose from a variety of cool professions and engage in exciting cross-server battles.
The innovative rotatable screen design allows you to switch between landscape and portrait modes at will.

developers.name: Perfect World Games Singapore Pte Ltd

name: Pokémon Shinju Adventures
description: Explore the Shinju region in the world of Pokemon! Explore the mysteries of world around you, discover the secret behind Team Sunset, and become the strongest trainer in the Shinju region!

name: Paper io 2: Complete Edition
description: Conquer territory solo or beat your friends in multiplayer mode!

name: Fart Game
description: In this hilarious and challenging game, it's all about holding in your fart until the perfect moment! Time and manage your farts wisely, because the more you let slip, the more aware your colleagues become.

name: Doll Dress Up: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Farm It: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Uboat Attack: Cloverfield Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Mall Manager
description: Stock the shelves and run the mall

name: Spearain
description:
SPEARAIN is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are constantly running from side to side. Your goal is to avoid getting hit by the spears falling from the top. Hold a button to run faster and to slow down the spears. You score one point each time you bump into a wall and reverse your direction. Collect the falling coins to score additional points.

The game is over when you get hit by a spear.

name: Zombies Crusher
description: Undead Drive!

name: Safari Puzzle Match
description:
Embark on an exciting adventure deep into the wilderness with Safari Puzzle Match!
Test your memory and sharpen your skills across four difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, Hard and Expert.
Match unique animal-themed cards in each level and strive for victory.
Capture the spirit of the safari and solve puzzles to earn rewards. The perfect memory game for nature lovers!

name: The Escapee
description: Award winning classic action & adventure

name: Demonology: Incubus - Chapter 5
description: Sin descripción

name: Umbra
description: Umbra is a big, nonlinear map with a narrative underpinning it. That narrative involves, among other things, gay girls. Gameplay ranges from low-tier-enemy-heavy slaughter and microslaughter to: small-scale traps, light incidental combat, parkour/platforming, quiet exploration and secret-hunting (often there's some mix of a couple of those). UV can get quite hard. Play on HNTR or HMP unless you know you want that.

name: The Muse
description:
A horror visual novel where you're an artist with artist's block. Nothing seems to inspire you anymore. Until, that is, a cute, pink bunny girl suddenly appears in your studio, asking you to draw her.

Do you do as she says? Or continue to struggle finding that spark?

Roughly a 15 minute experience.

name: Gym Business: Fitness Empire Simulator
description: Build Your Fitness Empire – Embark on Your Dream Gym Journey!

name: Gun Frog
description: Gun Frog is a unique physics-based movement shooter where you bounce on lily pads, kill flies and explore a vibrant world as a frog that ate a gun.

name: Broad Daylight
description: The day awaits. Whether it ends with you going to visit family, taking a breath in the park, or hiding inside your apartment, it all can be taken away without you having a say in the matter. Regardless of all the chances that life might provide, one truth persists: carpe diem.

name: Into The Matrix
description: "Into The Matrix" is a multiplayer horror game where you and your friends must explore, survive, and outsmart dangers. Beware the Matrix Overseer, who watches and twists reality itself. Many entities are after you, but the Overseer is the true threat. Can you escape its grasp?

name: Bara Labs
description: Bara Labs is a short collection of experimental prototype games made by our team. We will decide whether or not to make a full-length game out of the shorts based on how the prototypes are received by the players.

name: Sexy Memory Puzzle: Pool Massage
description: Solve the puzzles to reveal and collect pictures of a sexy girl receiving a sexual massage by the pool, hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match. Flip two cards, and if the numbers on them match, they will be removed from the board, revealing a unique image.

name: Fields of Gold
description: Fields of Gold is a casual farming game where you grow crops, expand your fields, and build manufactories. Defend your farm from mischievous rabbits as you transform your land into a thriving agricultural empire. Start playing now and defend your farm before the rabbits take over!

name: Tsubame no Sedai
description: A young man, rational and cold-blooded because he has lived on the battlefield since childhood, is attacked and injured by bandits. Injured, he takes refuge in a nearby abandoned shelter. There he meets someone. She is an android girl who was manufactured in the olden days as a babysitter.

name: Targeosity Horror
description: Explore an abandoned house with a monster. Play pixel mini games to escape from a maniac trap. Solve puzzles in terrible darkness until the monster hears. Overcome panic attacks using a demonic device.

name: Don't Let Him In
description: A Phycological Third Person Cinematic Experience - Some roads are better left untraveled.

name: NovaMundi: The Spear of Chaquén
description: A Historical Strategy Sim set in a beautiful and perilous land of mountains and jungles inspired by the geography of South America and its indigenous cultures. Unite the Muisca people to repel the Spanish invasion of the Andean highlands. New adventures await you every time.

name: Metaphor: ReFantazio - Atlus 35th Digital Anniversary Edition Upgrade
description: Sin descripción

name: Metaphor: ReFantazio - Atlus 35th Digital Anniversary Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Starship Troopers: Extermination - Warrior Tiger Bundle
description: Starship Troopers: Extermination is a fully licenced 16-player co-op FPS that puts you on the galactic frontlines of the acclaimed sci-fi series! Squad up, grab your rifle, and do your part as an elite Deep Space Vanguard Trooper to take back the galaxy from the Bug threat! Do you want to know more?

name: Outbreak: Campout Collection
description: Cypress Ridge is surrounded by zombies, dinos and ghouls. The only way out is through these horrific survival horror nightmares!

name: F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu
description:
A complete version of F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu was released as part of the Nintendo Switch Online - Game Boy Advance library, exclusively in Japan. This new version includes all of the missing content that could only be unlocked using e-Reader cards on the original release.

This version wasn't released internationally.

name: Torii Guardian
description: Torii Guardian is a top-down tower defense action game where you need to defend the Torii gate to another world from hordes of evil spirits.

name: Npool: Complete +
description: Sin descripción

name: Tokyo Cooking: Complete +
description: Sin descripción

Box contents:
Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero
Metallic Bookmark
Dragon Ball:Sparking! Zero Exclusive Diorama 264 x 174 mm

name: Animal Striker 2
description: Animal Striker 2 is a fast-paced multiplayer FPS where animals fight in intense arenas. Pick up magical weapons with unique projectiles, customize your loadout, and compete in team-based or free-for-all modes. Unleash your power and dominate the battlefield!

name: Hot & Hentai: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Discovery Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Unctrl
description:
UNCTRL is a fast-paced one-button game.

Your goal is to launch guided missiles and hit enemies and their projectiles. The enemies come from the right and constantly shoot. Press a button to fire a missile. The missile will always go down on its own and you can make it go up by holding a button.

The game is over when an enemy projectile hits you.

name: Arena Breakout: Season 6 - Operation Blackout
description: Sin descripción

name: Bust a Block
description: Sin descripción

name: Kickabit
description: Sin descripción

name: Orbital Dance
description: Sin descripción

name: Archery Legend
description: Unleash your archery skills! Step into the world of precision and strategy with Archery Legend. With 5 unique bows and arrows at your disposal, conquer 50 thrilling levels spread across 5 beautifully themed stages.

name: The Harmony Chronicles: Chaos Realms - Collector's Edition
description: Join Mona on her quest and experience the ultimate hidden object adventure!

name: Bitten
description: Sin descripción

name: Mash VP! Re:Vision
description: Mash VP! Re:Vision is a next generation music game with exciting 2 column gameplay! Featuring new tracks composed by hugely popular music game artists, choose your favorites to mash up and create a new sensation!

name: Half-Rats: Redridge
description: The first canonical mod in the Half-Rats series! August, 1999. You're a fresh college grad passing the time in your parents' rural retreat before the tourist season picks up and your first job as "Junior Researcher" at a nearby wildlife-themed resort begins. Located on the outskirts of the run down backwater town called Redridge, the crickets and your empty beer bottles are your only companions. It's getting late, and you decide to put on a pot of coffee and throw something in the microwave...just then, you hear a pounding at the door. Then...the windows...

name: Tales of Rein Ravine
description: Tales of Rein Ravine is an indie horse game that aims to challenge its players with unique real-life inspired riding, as well as tell an intriguing equestrian story to a young adult audience.

name: Retrojam 2
description: Map-Center’s Quake Retrojam 2 contains 19 brand new maps, a beautiful hub and hours of gameplay.

name: Sevver Levvel
description:
_SEVVER_LEVVEL_ is a limit-removing DOOM 2 WAD consisting of 11 base maps and 6 secret maps. It focuses on hectic spontaneous gameplay and features a few weapon and balance changes as well as two brand new enemies.
This mapset was inspired by Snowy44's favorite vibes, aesthetics, media and music. It features a variety of level types, ranging from small exploration-based ones to big arenas.

name: Silent Surveillance
description: Silent Surveillance is a horror puzzle game where you monitor multiple security cameras to find anomalies. Stay vigilant—you wouldn't want to succumb to the lurking terror waiting for a single moment of distraction. Can you survive the night?

name: Tiny Pods Rescue: 2D Board Game Edition
description: Real time tactical board game, abstract graphics. Send commands to pods. Stack them up, move them around a procedurally generated board map known as a district. You need to re-conquer the districts of Earth and Solar System. Thousands of human and alien pods at your fingertips.

name: Fantasy War Heroes: Chilling Fog
description: Press one of your houses and drag to other house to move your troops. Conquer all houses for victory. Enemy wants to destroy your troops. Now with movable heroes that appear later in the game when you have learnt basics.

name: Pet Cam
description: Arya living a peaceful life by day, but each night, an eerie phone call from her father haunts her sleep. One night, the call turns into a nightmare, unraveling a terrifying story about her past. Can you uncover the truth before it consumes you?

name: Webfishing
description: Webfishing is a multiplayer chatroom-focused fishing game! Relax and fish (on the web!)

name: The Path of Veins
description: I have seen the face. Amongst the small white bones wrapped in fabric. Beneath the veins leading to the goddess. Within the black blood of the eucharist.

name: Hexity
description: Build your city! Start with tents. Expand and improve life in your city. Explore new technologies and discover new buildings.

name: Casual Sport Series: Hockey
description: Grab a controller, jump on the ice and score goals to prove you're a hockey champion. Play in campaign mode against teams from around the world, alone, or with three additional players in couch mode!

name: Yet Another Hentai Puzzle: Cyberpunk
description: Yet Another Hentai Puzzle game to keep you happy.

name: The Moments Before Death
description: (Text Base Adventure Visual Novel) Input via text with VN graphics. Waking up in a mysterious field, you find yourself invited into a quaint house overseen by a gaunt old lady and her children. Yet, an unsettling feeling grows. The house's rules, seemingly straightforward, begin to unravel.

name: Mystical Sovereign Z
description: Mystical Sovereign Z is a sci-fi/fantasy hybrid strategy game. Experience real time battles and turn based strategy with various RPG elements and choices to be made along the way.

name: A Fascinating Story: Ice Cream
description: In the game, you need to find two cards with the same picture and successfully eliminate them. On the contrary, the cards with different faces will not change. The way to pass the level is to eliminate all the cards in the picture. You can experience more character pictures after passing the level~

name: HeartWood
description: Play as a young druid set to purify the wilting Ancient tree to save the forest's life force. With your staff in hand, use and gain new magical plants to help fight against the hordes of creatures. Will you restore the Ancient tree's power, or die trying?

name: Missile Survivor
description: Survive a barrage of incoming missiles, defeat ace enemy pilots, and become the air combat ACE!

name: Cursed Hours
description: Cursed Hours is a psychological horror game. You play as a thief breaking into an old mansion, hoping for treasure. Soon, you realize something is wrong. Doors slam, eerie noises fill the air, and you're locked inside. A dark presence is watching you. Escape may be impossible.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Manic Miners
description: Two new mining themed tables: "Deadly Digs" and "Malicious Mines".

name: Tidekeeper
description: Ride the waves in Tidekeeper, a strategy adventure game where you guide Finn and Chumby to help the residents of the Hourglass Isles. Master the art of scheduling to maximize your impact as you assist islanders, complete time-sensitive tasks, and dive into a variety of fun and engaging minigames.

name: Cats Hiding in 3D
description: Explore the coastal town and find cats in this cute and relaxing searching game. Can you find all 100 of the hiding cats?

name: Learn to Play Vol. 7: Safe Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: NPC Adventure: The Arena Update
description: The Arena Update is an update to NPC Adventure to add an infinite battle mode alongside many new additions

name: Zen Drift
description: A new way to experience car drifting. Enjoy every turn in a calm and easy driving. Just let your car drift and slide down the road. Catch the Zen!

name: 100 Hidden Cats: Pirates
description: 100 hidden Cats: Pirates is a hidden objects/clicker game. There are 100 pirate crew cats on the map, Your task is to point out all of them.

name: Carpathian Survival
description: Can You Survive the Wilderness? Step into a brutal, untamed world where survival is your only mission. Scavenge, craft, and hunt as you face the dangers of nature. Explore at your own pace, build shelter, chop down trees, mine for valuable resources, and fight to stay alive against the elements and wildlife. With every choice impacting your survival, can you rise above the odds?

name: Dead Detention (Rescribbled)
description: Dead Detention is a scribbly interactive story about a nerdy teen turned dooms day survivor! Play as 15 year old Max as he tries to escape his high school during a deadly zombie pandemic! Will he and his new friends get to safety?!

name: Tech Store Simulator
description: Run your own electronic shop! Stock shelves with the latest tech gadgets, set prices to attract customers, handle payments, hire and manage staff, and customize your store layout.Create the ultimate tech shopping experience in your Tech Shop Simulator!

name: My Fantasy Hostess Club
description: Manage a cabaret where you get paid to talk and eat with customers. How you talk and respond determines the fate of your club. Advertise on the newspaper, do fashion runways, or hang out with the cute hostesses and develop their social skills.

name: Stellar Larceny
description: Embark on a cosmic heist in this zero-gravity adventure! Maneuver the galaxy as a sentient robot armed with a magnet, jetpack, and gravity boots. Your mission? Infiltrate facilities, find parts, and return life to your friend - while running from a mysterious company intent on shutting you down.

name: Transformers: Galactic Trials
description: Choose your loyalty by playing as iconic AUTOBOTS or DECEPTICONS including Bumblebee, Megatron and Optimus Prime, and collect the stolen Prime Relics across the tracks to unlock new skills. Make it to the finish line by racing around 10 battle-race circuits in both vehicle and bot form, beating enemies along the way in exciting rogue-lite combat!

name: Nick Jr. Party Adventure
description: Guide Dora, Blue, Chase, Molly, Santiago, Darington and many more around a variety of interactive challenges as they get ready to celebrate the Friendship Fiesta, and explore the Nick Jr. universe in 72 levels across six different themed worlds. Nick Jr. Party Adventures features solo mode or up to 2 player local co-op.

name: The Last Night
description: "The Last Night" is a horror point and click game, mixing 2D and 3D with a very particular pixel art style. Will you be able to make the right choices ?

name: Metaphor: ReFantazio - Launch Edition
description:
The Launch Edition includes the Pre-Order Bonuses of:
- Archetype EXP Chest Set along with the Adventurer’s Journey Pack

name: PortalBox
description: This game introduces portals to the classic box-pushing game! With the addition of portals, problems that were impossible in the ordinary box-pushing game become possible. Let’s explore this wonderful box-pushing game together!

name: Last Harem
description: The protagonist, awakened from cryosleep, is guided by Nina from the Bits organization and asked to engage in sexual activities in a harem. To save humanity, the protagonist must impregnate many women; it is the only way left.

name: Revolution Idle
description: Join an experience where each revolution takes you further into the unknown! Revolution Idle challenges you to multiply your accumulators to reach unimaginable heights. Will you manage to reach infinity?

name: RPG Maker With
description: RPG MAKER WITH lets you make games for and with everyone! No programming knowledge is required to make your perfect game when using RPG MAKER WITH’s robust yet easy-to-learn tools and intuitive controls. Get inspiration and motivation by playing other creators’ games for free and sharing your projects and assets online at any stage of the creation process.

name: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero
description: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero takes the legendary gameplay of the Budokai Tenkaichi series and raises it to whole new levels. Make yours the destructive power of the strongest fighters ever to appear in Dragon Ball!

name: Terminal Error
description: Preyed upon by grotesque experiments, you must find a way out of the research centre alive in this first-person point-and-click horror game. However, to escape, you must first delve hopelessly deeper into the maddening corridors of the facility.

name: Wizard's Owl: Magic Delivery
description: Wizard's Owl invites you into a captivating world of wizards, owls, and a quest to save the magical realm. In this adventure, you take on the role of a determined owl working for a prestigious mail and parcel delivery service. Your aspiration is to become a personal owl for the main wizard.

name: Soulbind: Tales of the Underworld
description: It's up to you to become the Endless, a mysterious skeleton, and embark on a perilous journey. Collect monster body parts to enhance your character and use a variety of abilities. Explore sinister locations, fight mythical creatures and uncover the secrets of the Underworld.

name: Son of a Gun
description: Action packed top down shooter full of bullets, blood and explosions. Collect and manage your guns to fight jungle zombies, swarming bugs, heavy robots, slimy monsters and even space ghosts.

name: Return of the Saiyans
description:
Welcome young warrior!
Are you ready for an adventure? Join your favourite heroes from the Return of the Saiyans world.

name: Thronefall
description: A minimalist game about building and defending a little kingdom. Thronefall is a classic strategy game without unnecessary complexity, just some healthy hack-and-slay. Build up your base during the day, and defend it ‘til your last breath at night.

name: Indus Battle Royale
description: Welcome to Indus, an Indo-Futuristic Battle Royale featuring a next-gen tactical battle royale experience, a never-before-seen Grudge feature, a unique Cosmium win condition, groundbreaking Avatars, deep lore, immersive graphics, and more in TPS/FPS battle royale mobile gaming. Join our Open Beta and step into the world of Virlok, where your gameplay experience will help shape the future of Indus. Be limitless. Be a Mythwalker. Crafted in India for the World

name: Starship Troopers: Extermination
description: Starship Troopers: Extermination drops up to 16 players right into the fight against the Bug menace in this co-op first person shooter. Suit up and ship out to a far-off front as a Trooper in the Deep Space Vanguard, an elite Special Forces group within the Mobile Infantry. It’s up to squads like yours to battle against hundreds of bloodthirsty insectoid aliens and take back fallen colonies for the Federation. The only good Bug is a dead Bug!

name: Sigh of the Abyss
description: Embrace the monster within to change the fate of a nation in this dark fantasy visual novel.

name: Merge It
description: This puzzle game is about creating new objects by colliding other ones. Also you can change instructions that say how exactly this process works.

name: Europa
description: On the moon Europa, a lush terraformed paradise in Jupiter’s shadow, an android named Zee sets out in search of answers. Run, glide and fly across the landscape, solve mysteries in the ruins of a fallen utopia, and discover the story of the last human alive.

name: Metaphor: ReFantazio
description:
From the creative minds of the Persona series – Metaphor: ReFantazio marks ATLUS’ first ever, full-scale fantasy RPG, brought to you by director Katsura Hashino, character designer Shigenori Soejima, and composer Shoji Meguro.

Write your destiny and rise above fear as you step into a fantasy world unlike anything you’ve seen before. Fraught with unsettling mystery, the kingdom stands on a precipice. Now, you must embark on a journey, overcoming obstacles and forging bonds with friends.

name: Trainz 2019: Pro Train - ATSF F7A/B Warbonnet Loco Bundle
description: The EMD F7 is a model of 1,500-horsepower (1,100 kW) diesel-electric locomotive produced between February 1949 and December 1953 by EMD & GMD. This dlc features the F7A & B in four Santa Fe Warbonnet yellow, red and blue liveries.

name: Atari Recharged: Volume Two
description: Sin descripción
